verses.verse: אִמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> 'im-Ru Say לַאֲחֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H251><s%> la-'a-chei-Chem ye unto your brethren עַמִּ֑י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi; Ammi וְלַאֲחֽוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H269><s%> ve-la-'a-cho-tei-Chem and to your sisters רֻחָֽמָה׃ <S%H7355><s%> ru-Cha-mah. Ruhamah

רִ֤יבוּ <S%H7378><s%> Ri-vu Plead בְאִמְּכֶם֙ <S%H517><s%> ve-'im-me-Chem with your mother רִ֔יבוּ <S%H7378><s%> Ri-vu, plead כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for הִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> hi he לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo is not אִשְׁתִּ֔י <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Ti, for she [is] not my wife וְאָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> ve-'a-no-Chi I לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo am not אִישָׁ֑הּ <S%H376><s%> 'i-Shah; neither [am] I her husband וְתָסֵ֤ר <S%H5493><s%> ve-ta-Ser let her therefore put away זְנוּנֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H2183><s%> ze-nu-Nei-ha her whoredoms מִפָּנֶ֔יה <S%H6440><s%> mip-pa-Neih, out of her sight וְנַאֲפוּפֶ֖יהָ <S%H5005><s%> ve-na-'a-fu-Fei-ha and her adulteries מִבֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> mib-Bein between שָׁדֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H7699><s%> sha-Dei-ha. from between her breasts

פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- Or אַפְשִׁיטֶ֣נָּה <S%H6584><s%> 'af-shi-Ten-nah Lest I strip עֲרֻמָּ֔ה <S%H6174><s%> 'a-rum-Mah, her naked וְהִ֨צַּגְתִּ֔יהָ <S%H3322><s%> ve-Hitz-tzag-Ti-ha, and set כְּי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> ke-Yom her as in the day הִוָּֽלְדָ֑הּ <S%H3205><s%> hiv-val-Dah; that she was born וְשַׂמְתִּ֣יהָ <S%H7760><s%> ve-sam-Ti-ha and make כַמִּדְבָּ֗ר <S%H4057><s%> cham-mid-Bar, her as a wilderness וְשַׁתִּ֙הָ֙ <S%H7896><s%> ve-shat-Ti-ha and set כְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ke-'E-retz land צִיָּ֔ה <S%H6723><s%> tzi-Yah, her like a dry וַהֲמִתִּ֖יהָ <S%H4191><s%> va-ha-mit-Ti-ha and slay בַּצָּמָֽא׃ <S%H6772><s%> batz-tza-Ma. her with thirst

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בָּנֶ֖יהָ <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nei-ha upon her children לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo no אֲרַחֵ֑ם <S%H7355><s%> 'a-ra-Chem; And I will not have mercy כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Because בְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> ve-Nei for they [be] the children זְנוּנִ֖ים <S%H2183><s%> ze-nu-Nim of whoredoms הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah. like

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for זָֽנְתָה֙ <S%H2181><s%> za-ne-Tah hath played the harlot אִמָּ֔ם <S%H517><s%> 'im-Mam, For their mother הֹבִ֖ישָׁה <S%H3001><s%> ho-Vi-shah them hath done shamefully הֽוֹרָתָ֑ם <S%H2029><s%> ho-ra-Tam; she that conceived כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אָמְרָ֗ה <S%H559><s%> 'a-me-Rah, for she said אֵלְכָ֞ה <S%H1980><s%> 'e-le-Chah will go אַחֲרֵ֤י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after מְאַהֲבַי֙ <S%H157><s%> me-'a-ha-Vai my lovers נֹתְנֵ֤י <S%H5414><s%> no-te-Nei that give לַחְמִי֙ <S%H3899><s%> lach-Mi [me] my bread וּמֵימַ֔י <S%H4325><s%> u-mei-Mai, and my water צַמְרִ֣י <S%H6785><s%> tzam-Ri my wool וּפִשְׁתִּ֔י <S%H6593><s%> u-fish-Ti, and my flax שַׁמְנִ֖י <S%H8081><s%> sham-Ni mine oil וְשִׁקּוּיָֽי׃ <S%H8250><s%> ve-shik-ku-Yai. and my drink

לָכֵ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen Therefore הִנְנִי־ <S%H2005><s%> hin-ni- behold שָׂ֥ךְ <S%H7753><s%> sach Therefore behold I will hedge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דַּרְכֵּ֖ךְ <S%H1870><s%> dar-Kech up thy way בַּסִּירִ֑ים <S%H5518><s%> bas-si-Rim; with thorns וְגָֽדַרְתִּי֙ <S%H1443><s%> ve-ga-dar-Ti and make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- גְּדֵרָ֔הּ <S%H1448><s%> ge-de-Rah, wall וּנְתִיבוֹתֶ֖יהָ <S%H5410><s%> u-ne-ti-vo-Tei-ha her paths לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo cannot תִמְצָֽא׃ <S%H4672><s%> tim-Tza. that she shall not find

וְרִדְּפָ֤ה <S%H7291><s%> ve-rid-de-Fah And she shall follow אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מְאַהֲבֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H157><s%> me-'a-ha-Vei-ha after her lovers וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- she will not תַשִּׂ֣יג <S%H5381><s%> tas-Sig but she shall not overtake אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam, וּבִקְשָׁ֖תַם <S%H1245><s%> u-vik-Sha-tam them and she shall seek וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo but will not תִמְצָ֑א <S%H4672><s%> tim-Tza; them but shall not find וְאָמְרָ֗ה <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-me-Rah, [them] then shall she say אֵלְכָ֤ה <S%H1980><s%> 'e-le-Chah will go וְאָשׁ֙וּבָה֙ <S%H7725><s%> ve-'a-Shu-vah and return אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אִישִׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> 'i-Shi husband הָֽרִאשׁ֔וֹן <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-Shon, to my first כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki it was ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov for then [was it] better לִ֛י <S%H99999><s%> li אָ֖ז <S%H227><s%> 'az then מֵעָֽתָּה׃ <S%H6258><s%> me-'At-tah. with me than now

וְהִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hi he לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo does not יָֽדְעָ֔ה <S%H3045><s%> ya-de-'Ah, For she did not know כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi who נָתַ֣תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti that I gave לָ֔הּ Lah, הַדָּגָ֖ן <S%H1715><s%> had-da-Gan her corn וְהַתִּיר֣וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> ve-hat-ti-Roosh and wine וְהַיִּצְהָ֑ר <S%H3323><s%> ve-hai-yitz-Har; and oil וְכֶ֨סֶף <S%H3701><s%> ve-Che-sef her silver הִרְבֵּ֥יתִי <S%H7235><s%> hir-Bei-ti and multiplied לָ֛הּ lah וְזָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> ve-za-Hav and gold עָשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su [which] they prepared לַבָּֽעַל׃ <S%H1168><s%> lab-Ba-'al. for Baal

לָכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen Therefore אָשׁ֔וּב <S%H7725><s%> 'a-Shuv, Therefore will I return וְלָקַחְתִּ֤י <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-kach-Ti and take away דְגָנִי֙ <S%H1715><s%> de-ga-Ni my corn בְּעִתּ֔וֹ <S%H6256><s%> be-'it-To, in the time וְתִירוֹשִׁ֖י <S%H8492><s%> ve-ti-ro-Shi thereof and my wine בְּמֽוֹעֲד֑וֹ <S%H4150><s%> be-mo-'a-Do; in the season וְהִצַּלְתִּי֙ <S%H5337><s%> ve-hitz-tzal-Ti thereof and will recover צַמְרִ֣י <S%H6785><s%> tzam-Ri my wool וּפִשְׁתִּ֔י <S%H6593><s%> u-fish-Ti, and my flax לְכַסּ֖וֹת <S%H3680><s%> le-chas-Sot [given] to cover אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֶרְוָתָֽהּ׃ <S%H6172><s%> 'er-va-Tah. her nakedness

וְעַתָּ֛ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah and then אֲגַלֶּ֥ה <S%H1540><s%> 'a-gal-Leh And now will I discover אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נַבְלֻתָ֖הּ <S%H5040><s%> nav-lu-Tah her lewdness לְעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> le-'ei-Nei in the sight מְאַהֲבֶ֑יהָ <S%H157><s%> me-'a-ha-Vei-ha; of her lovers וְאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish and none לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- and no יַצִּילֶ֥נָּה <S%H5337><s%> yatz-tzi-Len-nah shall deliver מִיָּדִֽי׃ <S%H3027><s%> mi-ya-Di. her out of mine hand

וְהִשְׁבַּתִּי֙ <S%H7673><s%> ve-hish-bat-Ti to cease כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- to all מְשׂוֹשָׂ֔הּ <S%H4885><s%> me-so-Sah, I will also cause all her mirth חַגָּ֖הּ <S%H2282><s%> chag-Gah her feast days חָדְשָׁ֣הּ <S%H2320><s%> cha-de-Shah her new moons וְשַׁבַּתָּ֑הּ <S%H7676><s%> ve-shab-bat-Tah; and her sabbaths וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol and all מוֹעֲדָֽהּ׃ <S%H4150><s%> mo-'a-Dah. and all her solemn feasts

וַהֲשִׁמֹּתִ֗י <S%H8074><s%> va-ha-shim-mo-Ti, And I will destroy גַּפְנָהּ֙ <S%H1612><s%> gaf-Nah her vines וּתְאֵ֣נָתָ֔הּ <S%H8384><s%> u-te-'E-na-Tah, and her fig trees אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher of which אָמְרָ֗ה <S%H559><s%> 'a-me-Rah, whereof she hath said אֶתְנָ֥ה <S%H866><s%> 'et-Nah These [are] my rewards הֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> hem-mah These לִ֔י Li, אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher Which נָֽתְנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> na-te-nu- have given לִ֖י li מְאַֽהֲבָ֑י <S%H157><s%> me-'a-ha-Vai; that my lovers וְשַׂמְתִּ֣ים <S%H7760><s%> ve-sam-Tim me and I will make לְיַ֔עַר <S%H3293><s%> le-Ya-'ar, them a forest וַאֲכָלָ֖תַם <S%H398><s%> va-'a-cha-La-tam shall eat חַיַּ֥ת <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yat and the beasts הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh. of the field

וּפָקַדְתִּ֣י <S%H6485><s%> u-fa-kad-Ti And I will visit עָלֶ֗יהָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha, and אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְמֵ֤י <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei upon her the days הַבְּעָלִים֙ <S%H1168><s%> hab-be-'a-Lim of Baalim אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher When תַּקְטִ֣יר <S%H6999><s%> tak-Tir wherein she burned incense לָהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem, to them וַתַּ֤עַד <S%H5710><s%> vat-Ta-'ad to them and she decked נִזְמָהּ֙ <S%H5141><s%> niz-Mah herself with her earrings וְחֶלְיָתָ֔הּ <S%H2484><s%> ve-chel-ya-Tah, and her jewels וַתֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vat-Te-lech along אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after מְאַהֲבֶ֑יהָ <S%H157><s%> me-'a-ha-Vei-ha; her lovers וְאֹתִ֥י <S%H853><s%> ve-'o-Ti שָׁכְחָ֖ה <S%H7911><s%> sha-che-Chah and forgat נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD פ Peh

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen, Therefore הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold אָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I מְפַתֶּ֔יהָ <S%H6601><s%> me-fat-Tei-ha, Therefore behold I will allure וְהֹֽלַכְתִּ֖יהָ <S%H1980><s%> ve-ho-lach-Ti-ha her Bring הַמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> ham-mid-Bar; her into the wilderness וְדִבַּרְתִּ֖י <S%H1696><s%> ve-dib-bar-Ti and speak עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and לִבָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bah. comfortably

וְנָתַ֨תִּי <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-Tat-ti And I will give לָ֤הּ lah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כְּרָמֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H3754><s%> ke-ra-Mei-ha her her vineyards מִשָּׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> mish-Sham, there וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עֵ֥מֶק <S%H6010><s%> 'E-mek from thence and the valley עָכ֖וֹר <S%H5911><s%> a-Chor of Achor לְפֶ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> le-Fe-tach for a door תִּקְוָ֑ה <S%H8615><s%> tik-Vah; of hope וְעָ֤נְתָה <S%H6030><s%> ve-'A-ne-tah and she shall sing שָּׁ֙מָּה֙ <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah there כִּימֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> ki-Mei there as in the days נְעוּרֶ֔יהָ <S%H5271><s%> ne-'u-Rei-ha, of her youth וִּכְי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> vich-Yom and as in the day עֲלֹתָ֥הּ <S%H5927><s%> 'a-lo-Tah when she came up מֵאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> me-'e-retz- out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt ס sa-Mek

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah will come בַיּוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> vai-yom- And it shall be at that day הַהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu he נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD תִּקְרְאִ֖י <S%H7121><s%> tik-re-'I [that] thou shalt call אִישִׁ֑י <S%H376><s%> 'i-Shi; me Ishi וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- and will no תִקְרְאִי־ <S%H7121><s%> tik-re-'i- and shalt call לִ֥י li ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od longer בַּעְלִֽי׃ <S%H1180><s%> ba'-Li. me no more Baali

וַהֲסִרֹתִ֛י <S%H5493><s%> va-ha-si-ro-Ti For I will take away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁמ֥וֹת <S%H8034><s%> she-Mot the names הַבְּעָלִ֖ים <S%H1168><s%> hab-be-'a-Lim of Baalim מִפִּ֑יהָ <S%H6310><s%> mip-Pi-ha; out of her mouth וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- no יִזָּכְר֥וּ <S%H2142><s%> yiz-za-che-Ru and they shall no more be remembered ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od more בִּשְׁמָֽם׃ <S%H8034><s%> bish-Mam. by their name

וְכָרַתִּ֨י <S%H3772><s%> ve-cha-rat-Ti will I make לָהֶ֤ם la-Hem בְּרִית֙ <S%H1285><s%> be-Rit a covenant בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom And in that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, he עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with חַיַּ֤ת <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yat for them with the beasts הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh of the field וְעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> ve-'im- with ע֣וֹף <S%H5775><s%> of and with the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim, of heaven וְרֶ֖מֶשׂ <S%H7431><s%> ve-Re-mes and [with] the creeping things הָֽאֲדָמָ֑ה <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah; of the ground וְקֶ֨שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> ve-Ke-shet the bow וְחֶ֤רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ve-Che-rev and the sword וּמִלְחָמָה֙ <S%H4421><s%> u-mil-cha-Mah and the battle אֶשְׁבּ֣וֹר <S%H7665><s%> esh-Bor and I will break מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, out of the earth וְהִשְׁכַּבְתִּ֖ים <S%H7901><s%> ve-hish-kav-Tim and will make them to lie down לָבֶֽטַח׃ <S%H983><s%> la-Ve-tach. safely

וְאֵרַשְׂתִּ֥יךְ <S%H781><s%> ve-'e-ras-Tich And I will betroth לִ֖י li לְעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam; thee unto me for ever וְאֵרַשְׂתִּ֥יךְ <S%H781><s%> ve-'e-ras-Tich yea I will betroth לִי֙ li בְּצֶ֣דֶק <S%H6664><s%> be-Tze-dek thee unto me in righteousness וּבְמִשְׁפָּ֔ט <S%H4941><s%> u-ve-mish-Pat, and in judgment וּבְחֶ֖סֶד <S%H2617><s%> u-ve-Che-sed and in lovingkindness וּֽבְרַחֲמִֽים׃ <S%H7356><s%> U-ve-ra-cha-Mim. and in mercies

וְאֵרַשְׂתִּ֥יךְ <S%H781><s%> ve-'e-ras-Tich I will even betroth לִ֖י li בֶּאֱמוּנָ֑ה <S%H530><s%> be-'e-mu-Nah; thee unto me in faithfulness וְיָדַ֖עַתְּ <S%H3045><s%> ve-ya-Da-'at and thou shalt know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD ס sa-Mek

וְהָיָ֣ה׀ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah will come בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, I אֶֽעֱנֶה֙ <S%H6030><s%> 'e-'e-Neh I will hear נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD אֶעֱנֶ֖ה <S%H6030><s%> 'e-'e-Neh I will hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim; the heavens וְהֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> ve-Hem and they יַעֲנ֥וּ <S%H6030><s%> ya-'a-Nu and they shall hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. the earth

וְהָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ve-ha-'A-retz And the earth תַּעֲנֶ֔ה <S%H6030><s%> ta-'a-Neh, shall hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדָּגָ֖ן <S%H1715><s%> had-da-Gan the corn וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַתִּיר֣וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> hat-ti-Roosh and the wine וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַיִּצְהָ֑ר <S%H3323><s%> hai-yitz-Har; and the oil וְהֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> ve-Hem and they יַעֲנ֥וּ <S%H6030><s%> ya-'a-Nu and they shall hear אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִזְרְעֶֽאל׃ <S%H3157><s%> yiz-re-'El. Jezreel

וּזְרַעְתִּ֤יהָ <S%H2232><s%> u-ze-ra'-Ti-ha And I will sow לִּי֙ li בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz, her unto me in the earth וְרִֽחַמְתִּ֖י <S%H7355><s%> ve-ri-cham-Ti and I will have mercy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not רֻחָ֑מָה <S%H7355><s%> ru-Cha-mah; compassion וְאָמַרְתִּ֤י <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ti and I will say לְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> le-lo- were not עַמִּי֙ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi to [them which were] not my people עַמִּי־ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-mi- Thou [art] my people אַ֔תָּה <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah, you וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu and I יֹאמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> yo-Mar and they shall say אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai. [Thou art] my God פ Peh
